author: Aila Slisco
title: Anti-Parasite Drug Used Since 1980s May Help Stop Coronavirus, New Study Says
description: A study published Friday finds the the common anti-parasite drug Ivermectin can stop the virus that causes COVID-19 from multiplying in a laboratory setting.
content:
Australian researchers have published a study showing a drug commonly used to treat parasite infections can also kill coronavirus in a laboratory setting in under 48 hours.
